targets.query: SHOW TAG VALUES EXACT CARDINALITY  ON "vigie" WITH KEY = "testsuite"
SHOW TAG VALUES EXACT CARDINALITY  ON "vigie" WITH KEY = "testcase"
SHOW TAG VALUES EXACT CARDINALITY  ON "vigie" WITH KEY = "teststep"
SELECT count("status") AS "count_status" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_testcase" WHERE $timeFilter AND "status" = false GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)
SELECT count("status") AS "count_status" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_testcase" WHERE $timeFilter AND "status" = true  GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(none)
SELECT DISTINCT "status" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_testsuite" WHERE "testsuite" =~ /^$TestSuite/  AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "testsuite"
SELECT last("status") AS "last_status" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_testcase" GROUP BY "testcase" FILL(null)
/ SHOW TAG VALUES EXACT CARDINALITY  ON "vigie" WITH KEY = "testcase"
SHOW TAG VALUES EXACT CARDINALITY  ON "vigie" WITH KEY = "teststep"
SHOW TAG VALUES EXACT CARDINALITY  ON "vigie" WITH KEY = "teststep"
SELECT count("status") AS "count_status" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_teststep" WHERE $timeFilter AND "status" = false  GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(null)
SELECT count("status") AS "count_status" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_teststep" WHERE $timeFilter AND "status" = true  GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(null)
SELECT * FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_testcase" WHERE   "testsuite" =~ /^$TestSuite/  AND "testcase" =~ /^$TestCase/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY * ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "status" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_testsuite" WHERE time > $timeFilter AND "status" = false GROUP BY "testsuite"
SELECT count("status") AS "count_status" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_testsuite" WHERE time > $timeFilter AND "status" = false GROUP BY "testsuite" FILL(none)
SELECT * FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_teststep" WHERE "testcase" =~ /^$TestCase/ AND "testsuite" =~ /^$TestSuite/  AND "teststep" =~ /^$TestStep/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY * ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT mean("status") AS "mean_status" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_teststep" WHERE  "testsuite" =~ /^$TestSuite/  AND  $timeFilter AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "teststep" fill(none)

SELECT mean("responsetime") AS "mean_responsetime" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_teststep" WHERE  "testsuite" =~ /^$TestSuite/  AND  $timeFilter AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "teststep" fill(none)

SELECT mean("responsetime") AS "mean_responsetime" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_teststep" WHERE  "testsuite" =~ /^$TestSuite/  AND  $timeFilter AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "teststep" fill(none)

SELECT mean("responsetime") AS "mean_responsetime" FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_teststep" WHERE "testcase" =~ /^$TestCase/ AND "testsuite" =~ /^$TestSuite/  AND "teststep" =~ /^$TestStep/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "teststep" fill(none)
SELECT * FROM "vigie"."dev"."vigie_teststep" WHERE "testcase" =~ /^$TestCase/ AND "testsuite" =~ /^$TestSuite/  AND "teststep" =~ /^$TestStep/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "teststep"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES ON vigie WITH KEY = "testsuite"

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES ON vigie WITH KEY = "testsuite"
